mapper.select:
SELECT r.room_id AS roomId, r.title, r.content, r.gender, r.max_participants AS maxParticipants,
-- 현재 참여 인원 (방장 포함) ( SELECT COUNT(*) + 1 FROM room_join_request rjr WHERE rjr.room_id = r.room_id AND rjr.status = '승인' ) AS currentParticipants,
r.deadline, r.start_date AS startDate, r.exam_date AS examDate, r.ended_at AS endDate, r.created_at AS createdAt, r.room_img AS roomImg,
u.nickname, r.host_user_email AS hostUserEmail,
r.hostUserNickname AS hostUserNickname, r.categoryId AS categoryId,
c2.name AS midCategoryName, c3.name AS subCategoryName
FROM room r JOIN users u ON r.host_user_email = u.email LEFT JOIN category c2 ON r.categoryId = c2.id LEFT JOIN category c3 ON c2.parent_id = c3.id
WHERE r.room_id = #{roomId}
